name: Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector’s Edition of Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward includes: 
 
- Dragon Mount Figure 
- The Art of Eorzea – Heavensward – Artbook 
- Additional Content Disc: Eorzea in Motion – A Realm Revisited 
- Exclusive In-Game Flying Griffin Mount 
- Dark Knight Cecil-themed Baron Helm 
- Wind-up Kain 
- Fantasia potion
